definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
trouble/disturbance/rumpus/flirty/coquettish/abbr. for 離騷|离骚[Li2 Sao1]/literary writings/smell of urine/foul smell/male (animal) (dialect)

sentences.english: I was sexually accosted on the train.
sentences.chinese: 我在火车上遇到了性骚扰。

sentences.english: She was a typical victim of harassments, libel and sex abuse .
sentences.chinese: 她是这个折磨，诽谤和性骚扰的一个典型的受害者。

sentences.english: The victim can be any gender. The harasser can be any gender.
sentences.chinese: 性骚扰者和受害人并非仅限于某单一性别。

sentences.english: How a woman suggestively licking a lolly could face a sex harassment case.
sentences.chinese: 女性办公室舔冰棍是性骚扰。

sentences.english: A person who believes they have been sexually harassed can lodge a complaint with the Commissioner.
sentences.chinese: 一个认为自己被性骚扰的人可以向本委员会提交投拆。

sentences.english: There was the grandfather who took naked showers with her and may have molested her.
sentences.chinese: 她的祖父曾和她裸浴，并可能对她进行过性骚扰。

sentences.english: There are three elements constituting sexual harassment in the workplace (Li, Chen, Lyu and Qiu, 2016).
sentences.chinese: 有三个要素在工作场所构成性骚扰。

sentences.english: This paper is divided into five chapters to put forward suggestions on sexual harassment.
sentences.chinese: 本文共分为五章来对性骚扰问题进行粗浅的分析。

sentences.english: A nationwide manhunt for an alleged child molester is over.
sentences.chinese: 一次对所谓未成年人性骚扰的全国性搜捕运动结束了。

sentences.english: Facing such an outright sexual harassment, the student found herself in a dilemma.
sentences.chinese: 该女博士生面对这种公然的性骚扰，感到进退两难。

sentences.english: Anti-discrimination laws protect everyone from sexual harassment at work.
sentences.chinese: 反歧视法保护每个人在工作中避免性骚扰。

sentences.english: Monroe complains too about her early adolescent experiences of sexual harassment.
sentences.chinese: 梦露对自己少女时期经历的性骚扰耿耿于怀。

sentences.english: Six patients had recently come forward to complain that Copperman had molested them.
sentences.chinese: 最近已有6名患者指控科佩尔曼对她们进行过性骚扰。

sentences.english: The defendant was charged with child molestation, but he pleaded not guilty.
sentences.chinese: 被告人被指控犯有儿童性骚扰罪，但是他诉请无罪。

sentences.english: Avoid word and actions that constitute sexual harrassment.
sentences.chinese: 避免语言或行动上的性骚扰。

sentences.english: A question then appears on the screen asking: ‘Is this sexual harassment?
sentences.chinese: 随后，屏幕上出现了一个问题，“这是性骚扰吗？

definition: domestic violence/abbr. for 家庭暴力[jia1 ting2 bao4 li4]
